title: Crispy Pork & Corn Birria-Inspired Ramen
keywords: Birria, Ramen, Pork, Crispy, Corn, Fusion, Mexican

method.step: Get all your ingredients and equipment ready
Skim though these steps, then wash your fruit and vegetables
(Equipment and pan sizes vary, make sure you cook food thoroughly (even if it takes you a little longer than 10 minutes)
Heat a large, wide based pan, with a drizzle of vegetable oil over a heigh heat
Once hot, add your pork mince and cook for 3-4 minutes or until beginning to brown, breaking it up into very small pieces with a wooden spoon as you go
While the pork is cooking trim, then slice your spring onion(s)
Once the pork is beginning to brown add half your smoked paprika with 2tsp sugar and a pinch of salt to the pan
Cook for 4-5 minutes further or until cooked though and crispy. This is your crispy pork
Meanwhile, heat a large wide based pan with a drizzle of vegetable oil over medium heat
Add your tomato paste with your ground coriander and remaining smoked paprika and cook for 1 min or until fragrant
Add your boiled water with your fine egg noodles and drained sweetcorn
Bring to the boil over a heigh heat and cook for 1-2 minutes or until the noodles are tender. This is your corn birria inspired ramen
Serve the corn birria inspired ramen topped with the crispy pork, grated cheddar and sliced spring onion. This is your crispy pork & corn birria inspired ramen
